title: COVID-19 Vaccine updates
author: Mydr
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccination Information [COVID-19 vaccines - Is it true?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/covid-19-vaccines-is-it-true) [When will I get a COVID-19 vaccine?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/getting-vaccinated-for-covid-19/when-will-i-get-a-covid-19-vaccine) [Information for COVID-19 vaccination providers](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/information-for-covid-19-vaccination-providers) [COVID-19 vaccination guide for women who are pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning pregnancy](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/covid-19-vaccines-is-it-true) [What should I do before I get vaccinated for COVID-19?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/learn-about-covid-19-vaccines/what-should-i-do-before-i-get-vaccinated-for-covid-19) [Who can get vaccinated for COVID-19?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/getting-vaccinated-for-covid-19/who-can-get-vaccinated-for-covid-19) [What happens after I am vaccinated for COVID-19?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/getting-vaccinated-for-covid-19/what-happens-after-i-am-vaccinated-for-covid-19) [Which COVID-19 vaccine will I receive?](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/getting-vaccinated-for-covid-19/which-covid-19-vaccine-will-i-receive) Latest Coronavirus Vaccine information from myDr.com.au [Why Do I Need Two Doses of the Covid-19 Vaccine? Dr. Norman Swan](https://mydr.com.au/coronavirus-vaccination/why-do-i-need-two-doses-of-the-covid-19-vaccine-dr-norman-swan/) [Will the Covid-19 Vaccine Protect me for Life? Dr. Norman Swan](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/will-the-covid-19-vaccine-protect-me-for-life/) [An Important Vaccine Update - Dr. Norman Swan](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/an-important-vaccine-update-dr-norman-swan/) [Should Australian's be Concerned about Blood Clots with the AstraZeneca Vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/corona-virus-prevention/blood-clots-with-the-astrazeneca-vaccine/) [What Are Some of the Issues with Side Effects from the Covid-19 vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/side-effects-from-covid-19-vaccine/) [Was the Covid-19 Vaccine Rushed? Dr. Norman Swan](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/was-the-covid-19-vaccine-rushed-dr-norman-swan/) myDr.com.au Vaccine Content Signup to our newsletter to receive the latest in accine related content Covid-19 content straight to your inbox [What's the latest information about the COVID-19 Vaccines?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/whats-the-latest-information-about-the-covid-19-vaccines/) Australia currently has two approved vaccines for use, however, there has been a recent change to which vaccine most people under 50 will receive. [Will I Get Covid-19 from the Covid-19 Vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/will-i-get-covid-19-from-the-covid-19-vaccine/) In this brief video, Dr. Norman Swan explains why we don't need to worry about getting covid-19 from the covid-19 vaccine. [How Do you Manage Covid-19 Vaccine Guilt?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/how-do-you-manage-covid-19-vaccine-guilt/) Dr. Matthew Cullen explains why it is normal to feel guilty for receiving the covid-19 vaccine before others. [What Are the Known Side Effects of This Vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/what-are-the-known-side-effects-of-this-vaccine/) Dr. Norman Swans discussing the safety level of the two Covid-19 vaccines and the minimal side effects documented so far. [Are the Other People that Live in the Same House as These Hotel Quarantine Staff also first to be Vaccinated?](https://mydr.com.au/corona-virus-prevention/are-the-other-people-that-live-in-the-same-house-as-these-hotel-quarantine-staff-also-first-to-be-vaccinated/) Dr. Normal Swan explains why at first instance it will just be hotel quarantine workers who will be immunised and not their household members. [What Risks Are Individuals Taking by Not Being Vaccinated?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/what-risks-are-individuals-taking-by-not-being-vaccinated/) Dr. Norman Swans explains the need for all people to get vaccinated against Covid-19 and the effects of not doing so for the older and younger members of society. [What Are the Known Counter Interactions of this Vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/what-are-the-known-counter-interactions-of-this-vaccine/) Dr. Normal Swan explains the safety of the two Covid-19 Vaccines and the recommended method of having them administered. He also recommends discussing and seeking clarification from your doctor. [How Long Will the Vaccine Last?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/how-long-will-the-vaccine-last/) Dr. Norman Swan discusses why he believes that we will all need booster injections to protect ourselves against corona virus and it's many strains. [Will People be Tested for Antibodies Post-Vaccination?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/antibodies-post-vaccination/) Dr Norman Swan explains whey there will be no routine antibody testing after immunisation. There will be research projects ongoing but not public testing. [How Will I Know I am Protected After I Have the Vaccine?](https://mydr.com.au/covid-19/how-will-i-know-i-am-protected-after-i-have-the-vaccine/) Dr Norman Swan explains why we won't be doing antibody testing after for those who get the covid-19 vaccine.
